title: Name Changes
body: Why can a lvl 1 account with no games played hold onto a name I want.  Rito pls.  This travesty needs to end :'(

replies.body:
Hiya! 

To get a better idea of how long accounts need to be inactive before you can claim their summoner name, check out [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-)! :]
Hey Riot Katey Can you help me with something? it is very important
